title: West Pakistan Agricultural Bank (Recovery of Dues) Ordinance, 1959
title_en: West Pakistan Agricultural Bank (Recovery of Dues) Ordinance, 1959
description: Official consolidated text of West Pakistan Agricultural Bank (Recovery of Dues) Ordinance, 1959 (VII of 1959) published by The Pakistan Code (General Laws).

provisions.title: Section 2. Pledging of property to the Bank and recovery of its dues
provisions.content:
THE WEST PAKISTAN AGRICULTURAL BANK (RECOVERY OF
DUES) ORDINANCE, 1959
WEST PAKISTAN ORDINANCE No. VII of 1959
[24th March, 1959]
AN
to provide facilities to the Agricultural Bank for recovering its dues.
Preamble. WHEREAS it is expedient to provide facilities to the Agricultural Bank for
recovering its dues;
NOW, THEREFORE, in pursuance of the Presidential Proclamation of the seventh day of
October, 1958, and in exercise of all powers enabling him in that behalf, the Governor of West Pakistan
is pleased to make and promulgate the following Ordinance:__

provisions.title: Section 1. Short title and extent. (1) This Ordinance may be called the West Pakistan Agricultural
provisions.content:
Bank (Recovery of Dues) Ordinance, 1959.
1
[(2) It extends to the whole of 2[Pakistan].]
